response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I believe we can come to an agreement that is mutually beneficial. Considering the product's worth to you, I am proposing a special introductory price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This offer is exclusive to you and is intended to recognize your interest and commitment to quality solutions. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your budget and preferences, so we can proceed to finalize the transaction.", "product_price": 9500}
